title: Client Crashes All The Time
body: I run LOL in Windows 7 compatibility mode but even so the client crashes all the time{{champion:26}}{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} . It never happens in game only in the client. Right now I'm not allowed to queue up for a game because I "abandoned" a game when the client crashed in champ select. Also every time that I try to open LOL and Chrome at the same time my computer freezes and I have to restart entirely. WTH is going on?

replies.body: I've seen some reports on this, and the issue may be due to a problem with compatibility mode right now.  If possible, troubleshoot this by disabling compatibility mode.  Let me know if that helps!
